Row.Text: +1 [ICON_WORKER] Build Charges
Cache of Treasures
Whilst in the process of expanding one of our residences, we have uncovered what appears to be an assortment of ancient treasures! Gold, silver, diamonds, rubies, emeralds!
Into our treasury you go!
We should put these on display for people to see.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Become known as 'the Fortunate'[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Become known as 'the Fortunate'[ENDCOLOR]
After the discovery of a cache of treasures, we have become known as {1_LeaderDesc} the Fortunate!
After the discovery of a cache of treasures, we have become known as {1_LeaderDesc} the Fortunate!
After the discovery of a cache of valueable treasures, {1_LeaderDesc} of {2_CivName} has become known as 'the Fortunate!'
the Fortunate
Nothing
Innocent Execution
We have recently learned that a criminal scheduled to be executed may, after all, be innocent. However, in order to properly ascertain this innocence, we would need more time than that they have.
Execute him anyway. We cannot show weakness in our system.
Then he must be declared innocent until proven otherwise.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Become known as 'the Fair'[ENDCOLOR]
Although new evidence speaks to the innocence of a criminal, we have decreed their execution to continue. This can only strengthen the appearance of our criminal justice system.

We have stayed the execution of a potentially innocent criminal. Although there are those that have detracted from this act of mercy, we have nonetheless become affectionately recognized by the common people as {1_LeaderDesc} the Fair!
The execution of a potentially innocent criminal has been stayed by {1_LeaderDesc} of {2_CivName}, earning them the epithet 'the Fair!'
the Fair
Nothing
Spousal Rumours

Our reluctance to thus far take for ourselves a spouse has caused some concern amongst the government. Whilst some do not question our position on the matter, there are others that have begun to spin rumours.
We cannot continue this lie.
How dare they? We are a beacon of virtue!
We have simply yet to find one deserved of us.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Become known as 'the Homosexual'[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Become known as 'the Chaste'[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
Admitting the fears of our government over our disinclination to take a spouse of the opposite sex, we have become known as {1_LeaderDesc} the Homosexual!
Deriding the rumours of our government for their impertinence, our abstinence from sex has afforded us the epithet 'the Chaste!'
We have dismissed concerns over our reluctance to take a wife, claiming that we are waiting for the right one. Yeah right.
Because of their affairs with those of the same sex, {1_LeaderDesc} of {2_CivDesc} has become known as 'the Homosexual!'
Because of their abstinence from sex, {1_LeaderDesc} of {2_CivDesc} has become known as 'the Chaste!'
the Chaste
Nothing
the Homosexual
Nothing
